name: LStudy
description:
LStudy is an Android app, designed to help you create and memorize your own themes.

The player goes through these subjects through a variety of different minigames, inspired by Wario Inc, and other minigames.

The players can join subjects and groups not created by them to learn them through their unique code. They can aslo compare their standings in a rankings list.

LStudy is based on the Leitner Method, allowing for a faster and longer memorization time.

This is the first version.
This is part of a Thesis.
